title: Generative AI Integration in Consumer Devices: A Game-Changer in the Tech Landscape
description: In a recent move toward advancing AI innovation, Microsoft has unveiled the expansion of Copilot, its AI chatbot, to iOS devices. The chatbot, initially launched on Android, now extends its capabilities to iOS, showcasing its proficiency in tasks such as drafting emails, summarizing text, composing stories, and generating images using DALL-E3. This strategic move by […]

title: Public-Private Partnerships to Bridge the Gap in AI Skills
description: As the world continues to embrace the transformative power of generative AI (genAI), the need for individuals to acquire new skills has become increasingly evident. This shift underscores a growing divide between those without access to AI skills.  To address this challenge, public and private partnerships are emerging as a crucial force in the reskilling […]

title: Open Campus ID: Pioneering Decentralized Education with Blockchain
description: Open Campus ID is set to change the education industry through its innovative digital passport, set to launch in January 2024. The platform, leveraging blockchain technology, offers a decentralized approach to educational credentials and identity, addressing the evolving needs of the modern learning environment. Open Campus ID is empowering learners and educators in a digital […]

title: Rise in AI Adoption in Scottish Workplaces Revealed by Hays Research
description: A recent study conducted by recruitment specialist Hays indicates a significant rise in the adoption of artificial intelligence (AI) tools in Scottish workplaces. The research, based on a survey with nearly 15,000 responses from employers and professionals, including 886 from Scotland, reveals a notable increase from 26% to 32% in the number of organizations incorporating […]

title: Lazarus withdraws $1.2m Bitcoin from crypto tumbler
description: Notorious cybercriminal group Lazarus seems to be moving stolen Bitcoin after siphoning over $600 million from crypto protocols and users in 2023.Â

title: CoinGecko: Omnicat reports 49% price surge
description: Jan. 8 data from CoinGecko reports that Omnicat, an omni-chain meme coin, is the top trending coin with a 49.3% price gain in the last 24 hours.

title: Bitcoin ETF Showdown Imminent: 10 Issuers Clear Hurdles, Who Will Prevail?

title: AI to Outperform Humans Sooner Than Expected: AI Experts
description:
In a landscape where technological advancements constantly reshape the employment horizon, a recent AI Impacts survey of over 2,700 AI experts reveals an accelerated timeline for AI systems to outperform humans across all activities. The shift suggests that the era of machines possessing human-level intelligence may be approaching faster than anticipated. Contrary to previous estimates, […]
